Name: Leafy Tie
LongDescription: Boosts maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Bulbasaur, Ivysaur, and Venusaur.  You can get a Leafy Tie at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Bulba-Claw, a Bulba-Fang, and a Grass-Guard. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
